content:
What is the cost of booking for a flight from Boston to Miami on June 9th? There are two available flights as shown in the excel table below. 
| Flight Number | Departure City | Departure Time | Arrival City | Arrival Time |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Boston | 10:00 AM | Miami | 1:00 PM |
| 2 | Boston | 3:00 PM | Miami | 6:00 PM |
Assuming the cost of one adult ticket is $300, please provide a Java program that takes in the chosen flight number and the number of tickets as input and displays the flight details along with the total cost of booking.
